Text.Value: Down... in the dark... down... down...

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Why did you surrender your people to the cult?
What did the voice of the Absolute promise you?
To be... paladin again... protect... my people...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

EditorData.NodeContext: First spark of cognition - that something is wrong. You're trying to remember what happened to the others you brought with you (they were butchered, but you don't remember that yet)

Text.Value: Many of your people died. Because of you.
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Synopsis: Player uses speak with dead on the body of Zevlor
